title.rendered: Cunard to launch Cunard 4 Queens Gin Collection with New Queen Anne Edition Honoring the British Isles

content.rendered:
The Queen Anne Edition of the new Cunard 4 Queens gin collection

VALENCIA, Calif., Nov. 14, 2023 /PRNewswire/ –With less than six months to go until the launch of its new ship, Cunard has revealed it will raise a glass to Queen Anne in May by unveiling an exclusive new gin.

The Queen Anne Edition, which will celebrate the finest botanicals from across the British Isles, will feature as part of the new Cunard 4 Queens gin collection – completing the brand’s flavor profile and reflecting its global reach.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/cunard-to-launch-cunard-4-queens-gin-collection-with-new-queen-anne-edition-honoring-the-british-isles-301987805.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
